headline: 2 Construction & Mining Equipment Stocks to Watch Despite Industry Challenges
summary: The Zacks Industry Rank for the Manufacturing - Construction and Mining industry paints a dull picture. We believe that stocks like CAT and KMTUY are still worth a look.
